htmlTemplates.item: {%content%}

<style>
<!--
#{%widget.id%}_form .icon,
#{%widget.id%}_form .mjs-fakefile span,
#{%widget.id%}_form .mjs-fakefile div {
	color: #{%widget.properties.inputIconColor.value%};
}

#{%widget.id%}_form .mjs-input,
#{%widget.id%}_form .mjs-item-input label,
#{%widget.id%}_form .chzn-container-single .chzn-single,
#{%widget.id%}_form .chzn-container .chzn-drop,
#{%widget.id%}_form .placeholder{
	{%widget.properties.inputTextFormat.value%}
	margin-top:0;
}

#{%widget.id%}_form ::-webkit-input-placeholder { {%widget.properties.inputTextFormat.value%} }
#{%widget.id%}_form :-moz-placeholder { {%widget.properties.inputTextFormat.value%} }
 
#{%widget.id%}_form a.mjs-item-input-checkbox,
#{%widget.id%}_form a.mjs-item-input-radio
{
	color: #{%widget.properties.inputIconColor.value%}
}
#{%widget.id%}_form a.mjs-item-input-radio span.circle {
	background-color: #{%widget.properties.inputIconColor.value%};
}

#{%widget.id%}_form .chzn-container .chzn-drop {
	border: {%widget.properties.inputLineWidth.value%}px solid #{%widget.properties.inputLineColor.value%};
	background: #{%widget.properties.inputBackgroundColorBottom.value%};
	}

#{%widget.id%}_form .mjs-item-input
{
	zoom:1;
}

#{%widget.id%}_form .mjs-item-bg
{
	{%item.inputBackgroundGradientIE%}
	background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 bottom, from(#{%widget.properties.inputBackgroundColorTop.value%}), to(#{%widget.properties.inputBackgroundColorBottom.value%}));
	background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(#{%widget.properties.inputBackgroundColorTop.value%}, #{%widget.properties.inputBackgroundColorBottom.value%});
	background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(#{%widget.properties.inputBackgroundColorTop.value%}, #{%widget.properties.inputBackgroundColorBottom.value%});
	background-image: -ms-linear-gradient(#{%widget.properties.inputBackgroundColorTop.value%}, #{%widget.properties.inputBackgroundColorBottom.value%});
	background-image: -o-linear-gradient(#{%widget.properties.inputBackgroundColorTop.value%}, #{%widget.properties.inputBackgroundColorBottom.value%});
	background-image: linear-gradient(#{%widget.properties.inputBackgroundColorTop.value%}, #{%widget.properties.inputBackgroundColorBottom.value%});
	zoom:1;
	opacity: {%item.fillOpacity%};
	border-radius:{%widget.properties.inputCornerRadius.value%}px;
	-webkit-border-radius:{%widget.properties.inputCornerRadius.value%}px;
	-moz-border-radius:{%widget.properties.inputCornerRadius.value%}px;
	-ms-border-radius:{%widget.properties.inputCornerRadius.value%}px;
	{%widget.inputShadowStyle%}
}

#{%widget.id%}_form .mjs-item-border
{
	border: {%widget.properties.inputLineWidth.value%}px  solid #{%widget.properties.inputLineColor.value%};
	zoom:1;
	border-radius:{%widget.properties.inputCornerRadius.value%}px;
	-webkit-border-radius:{%widget.properties.inputCornerRadius.value%}px;
	-moz-border-radius:{%widget.properties.inputCornerRadius.value%}px;
	-ms-border-radius:{%widget.properties.inputCornerRadius.value%}px;
}

#{%widget.id%}_form .mjs-item-input {
	
}

#{%widget.id%}_form .mjs-button {
	border: {%widget.properties.buttonLineWidth.value%}px solid #{%widget.properties.buttonLineColor.value%};
	border-radius:{%widget.properties.buttonCornerRadius.value%}px;
	-webkit-border-radius:{%widget.properties.buttonCornerRadius.value%}px;
	-moz-border-radius:{%widget.properties.buttonCornerRadius.value%}px;
	
	{%widget.buttonShadowStyle%}
}

#{%widget.id%}_form .mjs-button-submit .mjs-button-text-content {
	{%widget.submitButtonStyle%}
}

#{%widget.id%}_form .mjs-button-reset .mjs-button-text-content {
	{%widget.resetButtonStyle%}
}

#{%widget.id%}_form .mjs-button .mjs-button-bg{
	zoom:1;
	background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 bottom, from(#{%widget.properties.buttonBackgroundColorTop.value%}), to(#{%widget.properties.buttonBackgroundColorBottom.value%}));
	background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(#{%widget.properties.buttonBackgroundColorTop.value%}, #{%widget.properties.buttonBackgroundColorBottom.value%});
	background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(#{%widget.properties.buttonBackgroundColorTop.value%}, #{%widget.properties.buttonBackgroundColorBottom.value%});
	background-image: -ms-linear-gradient(#{%widget.properties.buttonBackgroundColorTop.value%}, #{%widget.properties.buttonBackgroundColorBottom.value%});
	background-image: -o-linear-gradient(#{%widget.properties.buttonBackgroundColorTop.value%}, #{%widget.properties.buttonBackgroundColorBottom.value%});
	background-image: linear-gradient(#{%widget.properties.buttonBackgroundColorTop.value%}, #{%widget.properties.buttonBackgroundColorBottom.value%});
	border-radius:{%widget.buttonBGBorder%}px;
	-webkit-border-radius:{%widget.buttonBGBorder%}px;
	-moz-border-radius:{%widget.buttonBGBorder%}px;
	
	opacity: {%item.buttonFillOpacity%};
	{%item.buttonBackgroundGradientIE%}
}

#{%widget.id%}_form .mjs-button:hover .mjs-button-bg{
	zoom:1;
	background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 bottom, from(#{%widget.properties.buttonHoverColorTop.value%}), to(#{%widget.properties.buttonHoverColorBottom.value%}));
	background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(#{%widget.properties.buttonHoverColorTop.value%}, #{%widget.properties.buttonHoverColorBottom.value%});
	background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(#{%widget.properties.buttonHoverColorTop.value%}, #{%widget.properties.buttonHoverColorBottom.value%});
	background-image: -ms-linear-gradient(#{%widget.properties.buttonHoverColorTop.value%}, #{%widget.properties.buttonHoverColorBottom.value%});
	background-image: -o-linear-gradient(#{%widget.properties.buttonHoverColorTop.value%}, #{%widget.properties.buttonHoverColorBottom.value%});
	background-image: linear-gradient(#{%widget.properties.buttonHoverColorTop.value%}, #{%widget.properties.buttonHoverColorBottom.value%});
	{%item.buttonBackgroundGradientIEHover%}
}

-->
        </style>
        <form id="{%widget.id%}_form" action="{%website.rootPath%}{%widget.action%}" name="{%widget.id%}_name" method="POST">
                <input name="widget_id" value="{%widget.id%}" type="hidden"/>
                <input name="path_configuration" value="{%widget.data.configurationDataProvider%}" type="hidden"/>
                <input name="path_structure" value="{%widget.data.itemsDataProvider%}" type="hidden"/>
                <input name="mail_from" value="" type="hidden"/>
                <fieldset>
                    {%content%}
                </fieldset>
            </form>
